title: Trump's First Major Midterm Donation Aims to Unseat Brian Kemp in Georgia

sentence: That tells you all you need to know about what you are getting Georgia just a continuation of bad elections and a real RINO if you vote for Brian Kemp, Trump wrote on his social network.

title: More Republicans are working to undermine Trump endorsements

sentence: But Pence, who has increasingly shown a willingness to buck his relationship with Trump in the past several months, is now throwing his weight behind Georgia's incumbent Republican Governor Brian Kemp.

sentence: Former President George W. Bush is reported to be attending a fundraiser in support of Georgia governor Brian Kemp in another example of recent and longtime enemies of Donald Trump publicly rallying against the MAGA president's endorsed candidate, David Perdue.
